summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PioSwap DEX. All requested features verified: Swap page with Simulated chart badge, 'No trades yet' message, Pool creation modal, Explore page filtering, and API endpoints. Backend: 11/11 tests passed. Frontend: All UI features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Chart correctly shows 'Simulated' badge when hasRealData=false from API
Recent Trades section properly displays 'No trades yet for this pair' when empty
Pool creation modal correctly requires wallet connection
Creator-only liquidity restriction properly enforced (403 response for non-creators)
Explore page correctly filters to show only tokens with active pools (PIO, WPIO, USDT)
test_credentials: No credentials required - app works in demo mode
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Key API endpoints verified: /api/swap/trades/{token0}/{token1} returns empty array, /api/swap/price-history/{token0}/{token1} returns hasRealData:false. Chart shows 'Simulated' badge, Recent Trades shows 'No trades yet' message. Pool creation checks for existing pairs. Creator-only liquidity restriction works (403 for non-creators).

swap_page_chart_simulated_badge.details: Chart displays 'Simulated' badge when no real trades exist

swap_page_no_trades_message.details: Recent Trades section shows 'No trades yet for this pair' message

pool_creation_modal.details: Create Pool button opens modal, requires wallet connection

pool_creation_duplicate_check.details: API returns 400 when trying to create existing pair

explore_page_token_filtering.details: Only shows tokens with active pools (PIO, WPIO, USDT)

home_page.details: Hero section, Start Trading button, token ticker all working

navigation.details: Navigation between Home, Swap, Pools, Explore pages working

mocked_api_note: Chart data is SIMULATED only when no real trades exist (hasRealData=false). Once trades are made on-chain, real data will be displayed. Backend tracks all transactions in MongoDB.
